Package imagingbook.lib.ij

Class ImagePlusForAntialiasedFlattening

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.ImagePlus
      • imagingbook.lib.ij.ImagePlusForAntialiasedFlattening
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.measure.Measurements, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.lang.Cloneable
    @Deprecated
public class ImagePlusForAntialiasedFlattening
extends ij.ImagePlus
    Deprecated.
    This class extends ImagePlus to allow flattening of overlays with antialiasing. As of version 1.47o (26 April 2013) implemented in ImageJ and controllable by ImagePlus.setAntialiasRendering(boolean). Thus not needed any longer.
